official_title: Engineering Gut Microbiome to Target Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Post-menopausal females ≥ 18 years of age
* Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the breast ≥1.0 cm operable stage I-III
* Must have adequate organ function,
* Not receive systemic neoadjuvant therapy
* Be willing to provide tissue, blood, and stool samples for research study.
* Must not have taken any probiotics in the past 60 days prior to enrollment.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with autoimmune disease, immune deficiency such as HIV, irritable bowel, known diverticulosis, and other serious GI conditions at treating physician's discretion will be excluded.
